text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
D.C. Resolution 20-538, effective July 14, 2014

20 DCSTAT 3935

A RESOLUTION

Proposed
Resolution
20-491

To confirm the reappointment of Ms. Dianne M. Hampton, MS, CDVC to the Domestic Violence Fatality
Review Board.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Domestic Violence Fatality Review Board Dianne M. Hampton
Confirmation Resolution of 2014".

Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the reappointment of:
Ms. Dianne M. Hampton, MS, CDVC
3358 Blaine Street, N.E.
Washington, D.C. 20019
(Ward 7)
as a community representative member of the Domestic Violence Fatality Review Board,
established by D.C. Official Code § 16-1052, for a 3-year term to end July 20, 2016.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of this resolution,
upon its adoption, to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Domestic
Violence
Fatality
Review Board
Dianne M.
Hampton
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
